src:
Avanza ‘impeachment’ contra Trump; Cámara de Representantes vota a favor de investigarlo | Video
 by Redacción / AG



La Cámara de Representantes de Estados Unidos votó a favor del proceso de continuar la investigación de cara al 'impeachment' del presidente de Estados Unidos, Donald Trump; en tanto, el mandatario estadounidense denuncia una 'cacería de brujas'.
text:
Advance ‘impeachment’ against Trump; House of Representatives votes to investigate | Video
 by Drafting / AG



The House of Representatives of the United States voted in favor of the process of continuing the investigation in the face of the impeachment of the President of the United States, Donald Trump; Meanwhile, the US president denounces a 'witch hunt'.
